message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $600000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're working with a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $700000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $650000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $650000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $675000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your budget constraints.
